pairing_initializing_desc: Laster inn opplysninger om VR-maskinvaren. Hvis dette tar mer enn et øyeblikk, sjekk at VR-hodesettet og/eller trådløse adaptere er koblet til og slått på, og at SteamVR kjører.
pairing_nofreedongles_desc: All controllers have been paired already. If you wish to pair another device, please turn off one of your controllers or plug in a SteamVR Wireless receiver.
pairing_nodongles_desc: SteamVR is unable to find any hardware to pair controllers to. Please make sure your headset is connected.
pairinginstructions_generic_desc: Place your controller into pairing mode
pairsuccess_desc_again: You can pair another controller, or click 'Finished' to exit.
pairsuccess_desc_nomoredongles: If you want to pair another controller, you'll need to turn off a controller or plug in a SteamVR wireless receiver
pairing_knuckles_instructions_press: Press and hold the %1$s and %2$s until the controller chimes.
pairing_knuckles_instructions_blink: The controller will start blinking when it is in pairing mode.
pairing_tracker_instructions_press: Press and hold the %1$s until the tracker chimes.
pairing_button_differentcontroller: Jeg vil tilknytte en annen kontroller
